reviews.text: Lovely view along with the dam

places_with_reviews.name: Alchi Monastery Indus River View Point

reviews.text: Very nice view point of the Indus River, a few minutes walk from the Alchi Monastery.

It's beautiful to feel the iron age or 3000 years old engravings in the form of few animals that has been drawn on the polished rocks.Though the majority of drawings are from 11th century in the form of decorative stupas,we have to carefully search for the ancient animals as they are fading away slowly.
